document_data.name: Mosque of a Thousand Hummingbirds
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mosque of a Thousand Hummingbirds''' was a temple in [[Dihliz]] dedicated to the worship of [[Selan]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Ruined Kingdoms/Campaign Guide|19-20}}
document_data.Description: This impressive house of worship had many tiers and towers. Beautiful flowers and [[pomegranate]] trees filled the numerous balconies and ledges. Hummingbirds and [[winged serpent]]s attended the lively vegetation of the ledges and the gardens below.
document_data.Activities: The Mosque was directly supported by the court in [[Afyal]]. Because of the rather loose judiciary system found in Dihliz, the priests and priestesses of Selan often held positions of authority.
